history.proof: intros d pl tl H. induction H using liste_reconnait_ind. - exists pl_path_nil. split. apply pl_path_incl_nil. constructor. - destruct IHliste_reconnait as [plp [Hincl Hrecon]]. exists (pl_path_cons a plp). split. + apply pl_path_incl_cons. auto. + apply pl_path_rec_cons with (a := a) (t := hd) (tl := tl). auto. auto. - destruct IHliste_reconnait as [plp [Hincl Hrecon]]. exists plp. split. + apply pl_path_incl_next with (a := a) (la := la) (ls := ls). auto. intro Hcontra. sauto lq: on depth: 3. + auto.

ctx: apply pl_path_rec_cons with (a := a) (t := hd) (tl := tl).
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

ctx: apply pl_path_rec_cons with (a := a) (t := hd) (tl := tl).
apply pl_path_incl_next with (a := a) (la := la) (ls := ls).

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d pl tl -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp pl /\ pl_path_recon d tl plp

Premises:
Inductive pl_path_recon : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop := pl_path_rec_nil : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_recon d tnil pl_path_nil | pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)
List.tl : forall A : Type, list A -> list A
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive pl_path : Set := pl_path_nil : pl_path | pl_path_cons : ad -> pl_path -> pl_path
Inductive pl_path_incl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop := pl_path_incl_nil : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty | pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls) | pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => liste_reconnait d pl tl -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp pl /\ pl_path_recon d tl plp : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)
pl_tl_length_rec_6 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> n = lst_length tl
pl_tl_length_rec_def_0 = fun n : nat => forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> n = lst_length tl : nat -> Prop Argument scope is [nat_scope]
pl_path_recon_ind : forall P : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d tnil pl_path_nil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> P d tl plp -> P d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (t : term_list) (p0 : pl_path), pl_path_recon p t p0 -> P p t p0
non_empty_pl_path_exists : forall pl : prec_list, pl <> prec_empty -> exists p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl /\ 1 <= pl_path_length p
pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => forall n : nat, pl_tl_length_rec_def_0 n -> pl_tl_length pl (S n) -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> S n = lst_length tl : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_exists : forall pl : prec_list, exists p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl
Inductive pl_path_incl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop := pl_path_incl_nil : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty | pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls) | pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_incl_ind : forall P : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop, P pl_path_nil prec_empty -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> P plp la -> P (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)) -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> P plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> P plp (prec_cons a la ls)) -> forall (p : pl_path) (p0 : prec_list), pl_path_incl p p0 -> P p p0
sem_listes_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list), liste_reconnait d pl tnil -> pl = prec_empty
pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_tl_length_rec_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d la tl -> pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
pl_path_rec_equiv_0_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def d la tl -> pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
pl_tl_S : forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n)
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (...
semantic_equiv_1_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (r : reconnaissance d a hd), dta_reconnait d a hd r -> forall l : liste_reconnait d la tl, pre_reconnait d la tl l -> pre_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl) (rec_consi d a la ls hd tl r l)
semantic_equiv_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), pre_reconnait d l tl l0 -> st_reconnait d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list)...
sem_listes_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d p (tcons hd tl) -> p <> prec_empty

```coq
intros d pl tl H.
induction H using liste_reconnait_ind.
- exists pl_path_nil. split. apply pl_path_incl_nil. constructor.
- destruct IHliste_reconnait as [plp [Hincl Hrecon]].
  exists (pl_path_cons a plp). split.
  + apply pl_path_incl_cons. assumption.
  + apply pl_path_rec_cons with (a := a) (t := hd) (tl := tl).
    assumption. assumption. assumption.
- destruct IHliste_reconnait as [plp [Hincl Hrecon]].
  exists plp. split.
  + apply pl_path_incl_next with (a := a) (la := la) (ls := ls).
    assumption. intro Hcontra. discriminate Hcontra.
  + assumption.
Qed.

original: intros d pl tl H. induction H using liste_reconnait_ind. - exists pl_path_nil. split. apply pl_path_incl_nil. constructor. - destruct IHliste_reconnait as [plp [Hincl Hrecon]]. exists (pl_path_cons a plp). split. + apply pl_path_incl_cons. auto. + apply pl_path_rec_cons with (a := a) (t := hd) (tl := tl). auto. auto. auto. - destruct IHliste_reconnait as [plp [Hincl Hrecon]]. exists plp. split. + apply pl_path_incl_next with (a := a) (la := la) (ls := ls). auto. intro Hcontra. discriminate Hcontra. + auto.
